name: Rajasthani Traditional Lady
description: Handpainted portrait of a Rajasthani woman with a parrot, showcasing intricate details and vibrant colors.

name: Kerala Temple Mural
description: Traditional mural painting depicting scenes from Kerala's temple rituals, rich in cultural symbolism.

name: Warli Tribal Art
description: Folk art from Maharashtra, illustrating daily life and nature through geometric patterns.

name: Ukhrul Black Pottery
description: Eco-friendly black pottery from Ukhrul, Manipur, made using traditional methods without a potter's wheel.

name: Ganga Valley Painted Ware
description: Ancient pottery from the Ganga Valley, showcasing painted grey ware, black slipped ware, and red ware.

name: Meenakari Necklace
description: Traditional Rajasthani necklace featuring intricate enamel work and gemstone embellishments.

name: Kundan Bangles
description: Elegant bangles crafted using the Kundan technique, set with precious stones.

name: Balaramapuram Dhotis
description: Traditional handwoven dhotis from Kerala, known for their fine cotton and classic design.

name: Ikat Cotton Fabric
description: Hand-loomed Ikat fabric from Odisha, featuring vibrant patterns and rich textures.

name: Bronze Nataraja Statue
description: Intricately cast bronze statue of Lord Shiva in the Nataraja pose, symbolizing cosmic dance.

name: Madhubani Folk Painting
description: Traditional Madhubani painting from Bihar, depicting nature and mythology with vibrant colors.

name: Channapatna Wooden Toys
description: Colorful hand-crafted wooden toys from Channapatna, Karnataka, made using traditional lacquering techniques.
